notices.title: ⚠️ GLORY REQUIREMENTS
notices.content: All members must complete 600 Glory per day. Inactive players for more than 2 days without notice will be kicked.

notices.title: Weekly Custom Room
notices.content: Friday 8:00 PM internal guild war. Map: Bermuda. Be online on time.

notices.title: Name Change Policy
notices.content: New recruits have 3 days to change their name with the 'X-' prefix. Contact officers for tags.
